title.rendered: PALOVUE Lightning Earphones Headphones iPhone 11 Pro Max Earbuds MFi Certified Compatible iPhone 12 11 X XS Max XR…

content.rendered:
At PALOVUE continued innovation is our mantra, and that applies to each the technological advances in our merchandise, but additionally the aesthetics. Good design is vital too, and with our newest headphones, the MorFlow, out there in two colourways – black or white – and as well as, we’re giving our clients the standard nice sound and look they’ve come to anticipate, but additionally with worth that’s onerous to disregard. Compatible with iPhones, iPads and iPods with a Lightning connection to provide the greatest audio sign doable, our new fashions are designed to convey high quality and worth to our ever rising line of followers.

(*11*)

(*12*)

(*8*)

(*7*)

Crisp & Clean Audio

PALOVUE MorFlow are MFi-certified to make sure final compatibility with your iPhone, iPod or iPad*. So, no want for an adaptor. With the Lightning connection, you get audio as pure and crisp, as digital audio was supposed, delivered from the thoughts of the artist, to the recording studio, and at last to your ears (and coronary heart) in a single steady line.

*See listing of appropriate gadgets under

Premium Quality on a finances

The MorFlow line, out there in white or black, are designed to look good in any scenario, however above and under the floor, these buds are designed to final, with bolstered TPE coating for the cables, Oxygen-free copper wire for wonderful information transmission, alongside with a stainless-steel body to guard the Apple licensed Lighting connector. The earbuds boast 10mm dynamic drivers for persistently clear sound.

Direct, Simple Control

With the included Universal controller, together with built-in microphone, you cannot solely play, pause and skip tracks, but additionally take, finish and reject calls to your iPhone, alongside with activate Siri (Apple’s voice assistant). All achievable with the multi management related to the headphone cable, for the final word in management, however discrete and handy sufficient that you do not have to get your cellphone out each time you wish to reply a name or skip tracks.

(*12*)

Your Taste, Your Choice

MorFlow is offered in two colourways, to maintain issues tremendous easy, so you’ve got white or black to select from. Either means, you will flip heads with the fashionable however understated design.

Dynamic Audio

10mm Dynamic Drivers, to ship strong, deep bass tones, clear mids, and clear excessive finish frequencies, all balanced to present the audio a balanced wealthy tone, no matter you are listening to.

Made For Each Other

Being formally MFi licensed ensures your MorFlow earbuds shall be absolutely appropriate with your iPhone, iPad or iPod*, supplying you with fuss-free enjoyment, straight out of the field.

Universal Control

As our MorFlow Earbuds are formally MFI Certified, all of the controls you will ever must play, pause or skip a observe are all out there by way of the in-line controls that additionally will let you summon Siri, your favourite voice assistant.

(*12*)

Why People Choose PALOVUE

Elegant Design

Comfortable ear items in two colorways, which additionally contains three sizes of eartips, ensures there is a proper ‘match’ for you. Quality materials used all through to make sure you really feel assured in a nicely crafted product.

MFi Certified

With the Lightning connector, your audio will get out of your gadget to your ears in as pure and unadulterated means as doable. Music the best way is was meant to be heard.

Safe and Sound

As with all of our vary, MorFlow are designed to remain put what ever they undergo, so that you will be assured of problem free use, the minute you put on them.

Compatibility

  • iPhone 12/12 Mini/12 Pro/12 Pro Max
  • iPhone X/XS/XS Max/XR/SE
  • iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max
  • iPhone 6/6Plus/6S/6S Plus/7/7Plus/8/8Plus
  • iPad fifth/sixth/seventh Gen
  • iPad Pro 9.7in/10.5in/12.9in[1st/2nd Gen]
  • iPad mini 2/3/4/5 | iPad Air 1/2/3
  • iPod Touch (sixth/seventh Gen)

(*12*)
